attributes.action: Force Leeds City Council Councillors who've not paid Council Tax to stand down
attributes.background: Some Leeds City Councillors have not been paying their Council tax, and the Council used taxpayers money to fund keeping their identities secret, refusing a Freedom of Information request. LCC-to be forced to reveal them, for them to stand down as well as any members of LCC who played a part in this

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Leeds City Council. 
 
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 
 
You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: http://democracy.leeds.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
